profile.name: Amr Monier
profile.bio: Self-taught software engineer with experience building LMS and Marketing platforms. Curious to learn new technologies and enjoys solving code challenges and problems.

workHistory.brief: Designing, developing, and testing the REST-APIs. Maintaining and improving multiple legacy code bases. Providing new features for mobile apps. Mentoring junior developers.
Creating and managing project plans. Coding software changes based on specifications. Providing industry-leading solutions. Developing a fully functioning exams module.
Built a survey platform with a reward system.
Developing PL/SQL scripts for automation. Refactoring legacy code. Developing procedures and functions in the database layer.

education.school: Ain Shams University in Cairo, Cairo
education.brief: Bsc. of Computer Science with a GPA of 3.0
